component:
​ com.github.psi_rockin.CorgiDS ​ FSFAP ​ GPL-3.0 ​ CorgiDS ​ NintendoDS emulator ​ ​ ​
​ CorgiDS is a DS emulator that seeks to combine accuracy and speed. As of v0.1, it's a long way from either one, but with your support, CorgiDS will accomplish its goals.
​ ​ ​ com.github.psi_rockin.CorgiDS.desktop ​ ​ ​ ​ Games running ​ https://corgids.files.wordpress.com/2017/12/present1.png ​ ​ ​ https://corgids.files.wordpress.com/2017/12/present2.png ​ ​ ​ ​ https://github.com/PSI-Rockin/CorgiDS ​ ​ ​ corgids ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
First public release ​ ​ ​ ​
